input.sh: curl -X POST   http://0.0.0.0:5000/   -H 'Cache-Control: no-cache'  -2f12-4dd5-b5f4-e1b4ddfc6a7a'   -H 'content-type: multipart/form-data; boundary=----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW'   -F BlueConfig=@/home/vizuser/a/BlueConfig   -F a.txt=@/home/vizuser/a/user.target.slices   -F slice-4_report_0.bbp=@/home/vizuser/a/slice-4_report_0.bbp   -F ReportName=slice-4_report_0
ssh -i {{KEYLOCATION}} {{VIZMACHINE}} "VAR1=$(docker ps -f ancestor='bluebrain/brayns' | grep brayns | awk '{print $1}') && VAR1="${VAR1:---help}" && docker stop $VAR1"

ssh -i {{KEYLOCATION}} {{VIZMACHINE}} "docker run -d --rm -p 443:8200 -v /home:/home -v /var:/var bluebrain/brayns braynsrvice --http-server :8200 --circuit-config /home/vizuser/a/BlueConfig --circuit-density 1 --color-scheme neuron-by-id --renderer simulationrenderer --head-light 1 --circuit-report slice-4_report_0 --circuit-targets slice-4"
